name: Webgiftr
overview: Webgiftr is a social web site and Facebook application focused on making gift giving easy and fun. Dedicated to changing the way consumers think about giving and receiving gifts, Webgiftr is the only service that gives consumers tools for the entire gifting process, from event reminders to gift selection to purchase and delivery. Webgiftr is the first product from Web Personal Assistant, a company founded in 2008 with the goal of improving the lives of consumers through intelligent online services that reduce information overload and simplify tasks. The company is based in Santa Monica, California and is lead by founder and CEO Jon Siegal. For more information, visit www.webgiftr.com or www.webpersonalassistant.com.
